attributes.action: Refuse entry to asylum seekers and economic migrants
attributes.background: Britain is full. We took in over 600,000 migrants last year. Our health service, schools etc. cannot take the strain.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107117

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
